pkgmetadata.longdescription: robotpy-installer=================The RobotPy installer can be used to:* Install RobotPy on your RoboRIO* Install python packages on your RoboRIO via pip* Install binary packages from NI and distributed by the RobotPy project via opkgIt can install downloaded packages on your RoboRIO without requiring internetaccess, which makes it usable in a competition (provided you downloaded thenecessary packages when you were connected to the internet).For more information about installing and using the RobotPy installer, see `http://robotpy.readthedocs.io/en/stable/install/packages.html <http://robotpy.readthedocs.io/en/stable/install/packages.html>`_
